Sentece: The systemic availability of methysergide was only 13%, most probably due to a high degree of first-pass metabolism to methylergometrine.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of methysergide and its metabolite methylergometrine in man.
Name: Methysergide

Sentece: Methylergometrine had a significantly longer elimination half-life than methysergide (223 +/- 43 min vs 62.0 +/- 8.3 min and 174 +/- 35 min vs 44.8 +/- 8.1 min in the oral and intravenous studies respectively).

Sentece: The plasma clearance of MS was high and ranged from 74.2-102 ml/min per kg.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of methysergide and its metabolite methylergometrine in the rat.
Name: Methysergide

Sentece: The formation of MEM after MS administration was relatively low and appeared to be saturable since the formation clearance of MEM decreased significantly from 3.5 to 1.9 ml/min per kg for the low and the high rate of iv infusion of MS, respectively.
